availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Wycoff (Mill Creek, Carroll County, Kentucky, saw mill owner.)

body.p: Mill Creek, Carroll County, Kentucky, saw mill owner. Indiana native. Married to Amelia Ann "Graham" Wycoff, circa 1853. Father of Peter Wycoff, Amelia J. Wycoff, Windfield S. Wycoff, and Bennet C. Wycoff. Saw miller in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Mill Creek District 1, p. 64.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States(1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, p. 27.
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #22909112, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22909112 (accessed May 31, 2019).
